Summary: silver boomerang or arrow shape,second one was a silver shere
divs: Sighting DetailsMonday morning outside working in the yard with my 7yr old son.Looked up when jet flys over toward John Wayne.See stationary object much higher than plane.Grab my 10by70 binos & see craft moving around.I thought maybe ballons but too high.Another craft shows up and remains stationary.The boomerang starts to move behind the trees.I take a few pictures with my old pentax and zoom lens.I was pretty exited and my son obseved them too.I have also seen ufos at Lake Mead and thru my dobsonian but never reported them.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around January 17th 2011
